title: Festival time....
content:
Summer is almost there again and the the festivals will begin again. So are you going to sit behind the computer all summer or do you rather sleep in a small tent with some drunk idiots screaming to each other two meters away from you? And whats festivals are it going to be for you? Ozzfest? Download? And what bands are you going to see, post it all here.

I'm going to Arrow Classic Rock feastival in the Netherlands and am going to see Roger Waters, Dio, Porcupine tree, and Def Leppard.
I'm also going to Graspop Metal Meeting in Belgium and will see Guns N' Roses, Opeth, Motrhead, Saxon, Helloween, Edguy, Evergrey, Exodus, Ensiferum, Jon Oliva's Pain, Y&T, Dragonforce, Death Angel, Stone Sour, etc. etc. there....-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Re: Festival time....
content:
I'm a computergoer. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P

title: Re: Festival time....
content:
I pretty much got out of touch with most of my friends (and I always only had a few), and they generally aren't the kind of people that goes to festivals anyway.
Since I don't feel like going alone I don't see myself going at all.
Also I'm probably not as entertained by live music as some.
I did go to the Bevrijdingspop in Haarlem again, but that's free, and nearby, so that barely counts.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

content: American festivals generally suck. title: Re: Festival time....
content:
Nah, I usually just go to smaller concerts. Usually to see people I know.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/toughyorp.png[/img]

title: Re: Festival time....
content:
Scooter is coming to Finland again in this year! Last year I fool didn't go to see them as I was playing some stupid mind game with myself. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] I hope to see them this year! They're here on quite big festival called Raumanmeren Juhannus or RMJ for short. The festival actually lasts three days or something, but since Scooter will play only on one day, I'm hoping to go to see them that night and then come back. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I want to see them! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] Gaaarg! They're here 23rd June.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Festival time....
content:
Opeth!? Motrhead!? Helloween!? Ensiferum!? I wanna go!

Opeth is amazing live too mang! enjoy.[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: Festival time....
content: Actually, Ozzfest and Gigantour might be pretty good this summer.  Ozzfest is going to have Dragonforce, Avenged Sevenfold, and System of a Down, and Gigantour is rumored to have Opeth, Dragonforce, Sevendust, and maybe Anthrax again.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Festival time....
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Opeth!? Motrhead!? Helloween!? Ensiferum!? I wanna go![hr][/quote]

Well I have to say (even though I'm a fan) that Motrhead isn't that special live. They play so many times here that this will be the third time in three years I'm going to see them on a festival and they aren't very interesting live...

But yeah the rest is pretty nice...

[quote]Quote:[hr]Actually, Ozzfest and Gigantour might be pretty good this summer. Ozzfest is going to have Dragonforce, Avenged Sevenfold, and System of a Down, and Gigantour is rumored to have Opeth, Dragonforce, Sevendust, and maybe Anthrax again. [hr][/quote]
Dragonforce on Ozzfest?
Well it's better than nothing, I'm not very impressed how Ozzfest is organised.-----------------

They got put on main stage so hopefully it'll be more than 20 minutes.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: WOAAAH!!!
content:
